TabTitles.home: Menu Builder-Create a Free Menu Today | jelofy.com

Content.btn: Generate Your Free QR Code Menu Today!
Content.btnTxt: Start for free. No credit card required.

Service.l1: Enhance Customer Engagement with Dynamic Solutions for Your Restaurant
Service.l2: Amazing features to help you achieve customer success.
Service.customizeParagraph: Customize the look of your restaurant's menu to reflect your unique style perfectly. Upload your logo and adjust the colors and fonts to match your brand's personality. With easy-to-use design tools, you can update your menu whenever you like, ensuring it always stays fresh and aligned with your restaurant's theme. Organize your dishes into clear, convenient categories to make it easy for customers to browse and find exactly what they're craving.
Service.l3: Bring your meals online with our website builder, packed with tools for success.
Service.service1: Grow your business with modern technology—make the dining experience seamless.
Service.service2: Scan a QR code to access the menu from any device.
Service.service3: Pre-designed templates to streamline your restaurant’s workflow.
Service.qrCodeL1: Take a look at how the QR code on our free plan will look!
Service.jelofyService1Paragraph: Effortlessly create and customize your own scannable QR menu — no coding, no developers needed.
Service.jelofyService2Paragraph: Accept payments and manage orders in one place — coming soon to your menu!
Service.l10: Create, customize, and manage stunning QR-code menus with our intuitive platform — no coding or design skills required. Launch in minutes, update anytime.
Service.l12: No credit card required • Cancel anytime
Service.t1: Thank You to Our First 7 Users!
Service.t2: Your support means the world to us. We’re always improving your experience and fixing bugs — so your customers enjoy faster,smoother access to your menu.
Service.t3: This is just the beginning. We’ll keep updating this template and launching more to fit your brand and vision.
Service.i2: Unleash your creativity with complete control over your menu's appearance. We provide the foundation - you bring you unique brand vision to life with flexible styling options and layout controls.
Service.i4: Track your menu's performance with real-time analytics. Monitor customer engagement, popular items, and sales trends to make data-driven decisions for your business.
Service.i6: Seamlessly update your offerings with our intuitive meal manager. Add seasonal specials, modify existing items, or remove dishes with just a few clicks - no technical skills required.
Service.i8: Empower your team with controlled access. Create manager accounts with customizable permissions, ensuring your menu stays updated even when you're away.
Service.i10: Expand your customer base with multilingual support. Instantly translate your menu into multiple languages, making your offerings accessible to international guests.

TaxAlert.text: We’re not like your tax money — nothing here goes to waste.
TaxAlert.textParagraph: Every bit of income helps us improve the platform for you. Better features, smoother experience — all thanks to your support!

PricingPlans.title: Choose the right plan for your business
PricingPlans.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing. No hidden fees.

starterPlan.description: Get started for free! Manage one restaurant with essential features, including a QR code menu, full customization, and responsive design. Ads will be displayed.

features.qrCode: Access the Menu via QR Code

businessPlan.description: Monthly subscription with full access to all essential features, including an ad-free experience, multi-language support, and complete customization for one restaurant.

features.qrCode: Access the Menu via QR Code

pro.description: Designed for growing businesses! Manage up to 3 restaurants with multi-language support, ad-free experience, and advanced customization. Includes Team Access to allow employees to help manage menus.

features.qrCode: Access the Menu via QR Code

ultimate.description: Unlimited possibilities! No restaurant limit, complete customization, multi-language support, and an ad-free experience. The best choice for large restaurant chains and franchises.

features.qrCode: Access the Menu via QR Code

Q&A.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Service
Q&A.q1: What is Jelofy, and how can it help my restaurant?
Q&A.a1: Jelofy is a free online menu builder that helps you create and manage digital menus for your restaurant. It simplifies operations with QR-code menus that customers can scan using their smartphones, eliminating the need for physical menus and making updates easy. This improves the customer experience and reduces printing costs.
Q&A.q2: How can a QR-code menu help grow my business?
Q&A.a2: A QR-code menu reduces costs by eliminating the need to reprint menus for every change. It’s eco-friendly and provides a modern, seamless dining experience. Real-time updates allow you to stay flexible while offering convenience to tech-savvy customers.
Q&A.q3: How can I contact customer support?
Q&A.a3: You can reach our support team by filling out the contact form on our website. If you’re a subscribed user, you’ll also have access to support via email or WhatsApp. We typically respond within 24 hours.
Q&A.q4: Will my menu look good on mobile devices?
Q&A.a4: Yes, all menus built with Jelofy are fully responsive and optimized for smartphones, tablets, and desktops, ensuring a clean and user-friendly experience on any device.
Q&A.q5: Can I try the platform before paying?
Q&A.a5: Absolutely. Our free Starter plan lets you create and manage one restaurant with essential features. It’s a great way to explore the platform before upgrading to a paid plan.
Q&A.q6: Can I customize the design of my menu?
Q&A.a6: Yes! You can upload your logo, choose your colors and fonts, and organize your dishes by category. Jelofy makes it easy to match your menu’s design to your brand.
Q&A.q7: Can I create menus in multiple languages?
Q&A.a7: Yes, Jelofy supports multi-language menus. You can manually add translations for your items, making your menu accessible to a broader audience.
Q&A.q8: Does Jelofy support multiple restaurant locations?
Q&A.a8: Yes, our Pro and Ultimate plans let you manage multiple restaurants under one account. Each location can have its own custom menu and branding.
Q&A.q9: How does the QR-code menu work?
Q&A.a9: Each restaurant gets a unique QR code that customers can scan to view the menu on their devices. It’s a contactless solution that’s easy to update and perfect for modern dining environments.
Q&A.q10: What’s the difference between the Starter, Business, Pro, and Ultimate plans?
Q&A.a10: The Starter plan is free and supports one restaurant with basic features. Business removes ads and offers more customization. Pro supports up to 5 restaurants with advanced tools, and Ultimate includes unlimited restaurants, full customization, and multi-language support — ideal for chains or franchises.
Q&A.a11: No. Our pricing is fully transparent. What you see is what you pay — there are no hidden charges.
Q&A.q12: Can I see how many people are viewing my menu?
Q&A.a12: Yes, analytics are available for subscribed users, showing real-time and historical views. This helps you understand customer behavior and improve your offerings.
Q&A.q13: How do I get support if I have a problem?
Q&A.a13: If you need help, fill out our contact form. Subscribed users can also reach us via email or WhatsApp. We aim to respond to all support requests within 24 hours.
Q&A.a14: Currently, translations are added manually by you. We provide tools to manage translations easily, and we’re exploring automatic translation options for the future.
Q&A.a15: Yes. We take data security seriously and use industry-standard measures to protect your information. Your data is encrypted and stored securely in compliance with relevant privacy regulations.

Contact.title: HAVE SOME QUESTIONS?
Contact.content: Have questions we haven’t answered yet? Fill out the form, and we’ll get back to you within 24 hours!
Contact.contactTitle: Need a quicker way to reach us?
Contact.contactMessage: Contact one of our customer support team members at jelofyteam@gmail.com, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible!

About.title: Who We Are and What We Do
About.p1: At Jelofy, our goal is to make restaurant management simpler, faster, and more efficient. Instead of spending hundreds of dollars on developers and designers, you can create and customize your own menu design at an affordable price, all while maintaining full control over your branding. We understand that every restaurant is unique, so we offer flexible, user-friendly tools to fit your specific needs. Plus, we’re always improving, regularly adding new features to ensure your business stays ahead with the latest technology, driving growth and customer satisfaction.
About.btn: Join us today and take your restaurant’s menu to the next level!
About.aboutFormContent: Stay Updated and Get Free Coupons!
About.aboutFormParagraph: Subscribe now to receive the latest news, updates, and exclusive event information. As a thank you, you'll get free coupons for upcoming events, so you can save while you stay in the know. Don’t miss out on exciting offers

HelpSupport.title: Help & Support
HelpSupport.subtitle: We're here to help you with any questions or issues.
HelpSupport.name: Your Name
HelpSupport.subject: Subject

HelpSupportFAQs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
HelpSupportFAQs.q1: How do I change my subscription plan?
HelpSupportFAQs.a1: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime from the Account Settings page.
HelpSupportFAQs.q2: Where can I find my QR code menu?
HelpSupportFAQs.a2: Your QR code menu is available in the Restaurants Dashboard. You can download or view it online.
HelpSupportFAQs.q3: How many team members can I add?
HelpSupportFAQs.a3: The number of team members depends on your plan: Free allows 0, Business allows 3, Pro allows 12, and Ultimate offers unlimited users.
HelpSupportFAQs.q4: How do I customize my menu design?
HelpSupportFAQs.a4: Go to the Dashboard page, click 'Customize Menu Design', and update your logo, text, colors, and more.
HelpSupportFAQs.q5: Where can i cancel my subscription?
HelpSupportFAQs.a5: Go to Settings > Account Settings > Cancel Subscription. This will end your current plan immediately.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.updateProfileInfo: Change your name, email, and other details
Settings.paymentInfo: Add or update your payment information
Settings.cancelInfo: This will end your current plan immediately
Settings.deleteAccountInfo: Delete your account and all data

TermsService.title: Terms of Service
TermsService.subTitle: Effective Date: June 8, 2025
TermsService.introductionText: Jelofy provides a platform for restaurant owners to create, manage, and share digital QR-code menus. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
TermsService.subscriptionPaymentText1: Our platform offers subscription-based plans. By subscribing, you agree to be billed on a recurring basis according to your selected plan. Payments are processed securely via
TermsService.subscriptionPaymentText2: our payment provider. Paddle may handle your billing information and transaction details in accordance with their
TermsService.subscriptionPaymentText3: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Features and access will remain active until the end of your billing period.
TermsService.refundPolicyText2: for new subscribers if the platform does not meet your expectations. Refund requests must be processed through Paddle and can be submitted to
TermsService.refundPolicyText3: Refunds will not be issued after 7 days or for subscription renewals. Paddle's refund processing times may apply.
TermsService.privacyPolicyText1: We are committed to protecting your privacy. The information you provide, such as your email, restaurant details, and payment info, will only be used to deliver our services and improve the platform.
TermsService.privacyPolicyText2: We never sell your data. Your data may be shared with trusted third parties like our payment provider (Paddle) strictly for billing, fraud prevention, and compliance purposes.
TermsService.dataSecurityText: All customer data is stored securely. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. Paddle complies with PCI-DSS standards for payment processing.
TermsService.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
TermsService.contactUsText: If you have questions about these terms, privacy, or refunds, contact us at:
